Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.se2018.network.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Server
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ServerInterface
    The entry point for the server. Manages all the connections and waits for client's connections

      • connectRMIClient

        public boolean connectRMIClient(RemoteProxyRMIInterface remoteProxyRMI,
                                java.lang.String player)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        A method that must be called from a remote client via RMI. Tries to connect the client with this serverCome cCome
        Specified by:
        connectRMIClient in interface ServerInterface
        Parameters:
        remoteProxyRMI - the server's representation on client side
        player - the nickname of the player
        Returns:
        true if the connection is successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if there is a communication error
